item.text: About that time King Herod laid hands on some from the church to harm them.

He had <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>, the <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> of <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>, <st data-num="337" class="">executed</st> with a <st data-num="3162" class="">sword</st>.<n id="1" />

When he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> this <st data-num="701" class="">pleased</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="4369" class="">proceeded</st> to <st data-num="4815" class="">arrest</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2532">too</st>. (This <st data-num="1510" class="">took place</st> <st data-num="2250">during</st> the feast of <st data-num="106" class="">Unleavened Bread</st>.)<n id="2" />

When he had <st data-num="4084" class="">seized</st> <st data-num="3739">him</st>, he <st data-num="5087" class="">put</st> him <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st>, <st data-num="3860" class="">handing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">over</st> to <st data-num="5064" class="">four</st> <st data-num="5069" class="">squads</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers</st> to <st data-num="5442" class="">guard</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. Herod<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1014" class="">planned</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="321" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="321" class="">out</st> for <st data-num="2992">public trial</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="3957" class="">Passover</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> was <st data-num="5083" class="">kept</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> those <st data-num="5259" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1619" class="">earnestly</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4335" class="">praying</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="2" />

On <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> very <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="3753">before</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st> was <st data-num="3195" class="">going</st> to <st data-num="4254">bring</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4254">out</st> for trial,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> was <st data-num="2837" class="">sleeping</st> <st data-num="3342" class="">between</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers</st>, <st data-num="1210" class="">bound</st> with <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="254" class="">chains</st>, while<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5441" class="">guards</st> <st data-num="4253">in front of</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> were <st data-num="5083">keeping watch<n id="3" /> over</st> the <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st>.

<st data-num="2400" class="">Suddenly</st><n id="1" /> an <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2186" class="">appeared</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> <st data-num="2989" class="">shone</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3612">prison cell</st>. He <st data-num="3960" class="">struck</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> on the <st data-num="4125" class="">side</st> and <st data-num="1453" class="">woke</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">up</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="450">Get up</st> <st data-num="5034" class="">quickly</st>!” <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="254" class="">chains</st> <st data-num="1601">fell off</st> Peter’s<n id="4" /> <st data-num="5495" class="">wrists</st>.<n id="5" />

The <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2224">Fasten your belt</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5265">put on</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4547" class="">sandals</st>.” Peter<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> the angel<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4016" class="">Put on</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloak</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”

Peter<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1831">went out</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> him;<n id="3" /> he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">realize</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> what was <st data-num="1096" class="">happening</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> was <st data-num="227">real</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1161">but</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">thought</st> he was <st data-num="991" class="">seeing</st> a <st data-num="3705" class="">vision</st>.

After they had <st data-num="1330" class="">passed</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1208" class="">second</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">guards</st>,<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="4603" class="">iron</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4439" class="">gate</st> <st data-num="5342" class="">leading</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>. It<n id="3" /> <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="844">by itself</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="1831">went outside</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4281" class="">walked down</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4505">narrow street</st>,<n id="5" /> when <st data-num="2112">at once</st> the <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> <st data-num="868" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
When Peter came to himself, he said, “Now I know for certain that the Lord has sent his angel and rescued me from the hand of Herod and from everything the Jewish people were expecting to happen.”
When Peter realized this, he went to the house of Mary, the mother of John Mark, where many people had gathered together and were praying.

When <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="2925" class="">knocked</st> at the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> of the <st data-num="4440">outer gate</st>, a <st data-num="3814">slave girl</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="4498" class="">Rhoda</st> <st data-num="5219" class="">answered</st>.<n id="1" />

When she <st data-num="1921" class="">recognized</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter’s</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>, she was so <st data-num="5479" class="">overjoyed</st> she did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="455" class="">open</st> the <st data-num="4440" class="">gate</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1532">ran back in</st> and <st data-num="518" class="">told</st><n id="1" /> them<n id="2" /> that <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> was <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="4440" class="">gate</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “You’ve <st data-num="3105" class="">lost</st> your <st data-num="3105" class="">mind</st>!”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> she kept <st data-num="1340" class="">insisting</st> <st data-num="3779" class="">that</st> it <st data-num="2192" class="">was</st> Peter,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> they kept <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>,<n id="3" /> “It <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st>!”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="1961" class="">continued</st> <st data-num="2925" class="">knocking</st>, <st data-num="1161">and</st> when they <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st> the door<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="3708" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, they were <st data-num="1839">greatly astonished</st>.<n id="2" />

He motioned to them with his hand to be quiet and then related how the Lord had brought him out of the prison. He said, “Tell James and the brothers these things,” and then he left and went to another place.
At daybreak there was great consternation among the soldiers over what had become of Peter.
When Herod had searched for him and did not find him, he questioned the guards and commanded that they be led away to execution. Then Herod went down from Judea to Caesarea and stayed there.

Now Herod was having an angry quarrel with the people of Tyre and Sidon. So they joined together and presented themselves before him. And after convincing Blastus, the king’s personal assistant, to help them, they asked for peace because their country’s food supply was provided by the king’s country.

On a <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="5002">determined in advance</st>, <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1746">put on</st> his <st data-num="937" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="2066" class="">robes</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2523">sat down</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="968">judgment seat</st>,<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="1215">made a speech</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="1218" class="">crowd</st><n id="1" /> began to <st data-num="2019" class="">shout</st>,<n id="2" /> “The <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> of a <st data-num="2316" class="">god</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> of a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>!”

<st data-num="3916" class="">Immediately</st> an <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3960" class="">struck</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">Herod</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3960" class="">down</st> <st data-num="473" class="">because</st> he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4662">eaten by worms</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1634" class="">died</st>.<n id="4" />
But the word of God kept on increasing and multiplying.
So Barnabas and Saul returned to Jerusalem when they had completed their mission, bringing along with them John Mark.
